BLUE_PILL.ADD_SECOND_RADIO_ANYTIME: You can add a second radio anytime, at no additional cost by contacting customer care.

AddSecondRadioPageComponent.RECEIVE_A_CREDIT_DESCRIPTION: If you are adding an active subscription to your PVIP plan, you may receive a credit towards your account after this transaction.

FIND_SECOND_RADIO.TITLE: Choose your second Platinum VIP listening option
FIND_SECOND_RADIO.PARAGRAPH_ONLY_RADIO: For no additional charge, link a radio to your Platinum VIP subscription.
FIND_SECOND_RADIO.PARAGRAPH_WITH_STREAMING: There is no additional charge for adding a second radio.

AddSecondRadioPageComponent.LEGAL_COPY: Adding A Second Radio: Your Platinum VIP subscription includes access to SiriusXM content on up to two radios with separate SXM App logins for each activated radio and other benefits as outlined when you activated your Platinum VIP subscription. By activating this second radio on your Platinum VIP subscription, all terms as set forth in the Customer Agreement and Platinum VIP Offer Details will also apply to this radio. Featured Benefit(s) will be provided solely to the one (1) primary account holder of the Plan. Your subscription will continue to automatically renew each month for as long as at least one radio remains active on this Plan. You may cancel at any time by calling us at 866-635-2349. Upon cancellation of all radios on this subscription Plan your service and all VIP Featured Benefits will end.

AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.MAIN_PARAGRAPH: Your {{deviceInfo}} will be added to your existing Platinum VIP today.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.STREAMING_LINKED: VIP Streaming will be added to your existing Platinum VIP Plan.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.TOOLTIP: A pro-rated credit for the unused service in your old subscription has been applied to your account. It will be used for future billing events, or can be refunded to you upon your request.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.SELF_PAID_RADIO_PARAGRAPH: Your account will be credited for any paid period remaining on your {{currentPackageName}}. As a reminder, your Platinum VIP recurring monthly payment of {{ monthlyPrice }} will remain the same, and your next payment is due on {{ nextPaymentDate }}. Your Platinum VIP subscription will continue as long as there is at least one active radio on the plan.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.NON_SELF_PAID_RADIO_PARAGRAPH: As a reminder, your Platinum VIP recurring monthly payment of {{ monthlyPrice }} will remain the same, and your next payment is due {{ nextPaymentDate }}. Your Platinum VIP subscription will continue as long as there is at least one active radio on the plan.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.RADIO_PARAGRAPH_HTML: By clicking “Complete,” all terms as set forth in the Customer Agreement and Platinum VIP Offer Details will also apply to this radio. You can change or cancel at any time by contacting us by chat or by calling 1-866-607-4225.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.SELF_PAID_STREAMING_PARAGRAPH: Your account will be credited for any paid period remaining on your {{currentPackageName}}. As a reminder, your Platinum VIP recurring monthly payment of {{monthlyPrice}} will remain the same, and your next payment is due {{nextPaymentDate}}. Your Platinum VIP subscription will continue as long as there is at least one active satellite radio on the plan. You must maintain at least one active satellite-enabled radio on this plan. If your satellite-enabled radio is cancelled by SiriusXM and you have not contacted us, then SiriusXM will automatically downgrade your VIP Streaming to a standalone Streaming Platinum Plan, which will bill each month at the then-current rate of (currently, $10.99/month) plus fees and taxes, unless you contact us to cancel.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.NON_SELF_PAID_STREAMING_PARAGRAPH: As a reminder, your Platinum VIP recurring monthly payment of {{monthlyPrice}} will remain the same, and your next payment is due {{nextPaymentDate}}. Your Platinum VIP subscription will continue as long as there is at least one active satellite radio on the plan. You must maintain at least one active satellite-enabled radio on this plan. If your satellite-enabled radio is cancelled by SiriusXM and you have not contacted us, then SiriusXM will automatically downgrade your VIP Streaming to a standalone Streaming Platinum Plan, which will bill each month at the then-current rate of (currently, $10.99/month) plus fees and taxes, unless you contact us to cancel.
AddSecondRadioOrderSummaryComponent.STREAMING_PARAGRAPH_HTML: By clicking “Complete,” all terms as set forth in the Customer Agreement and Platinum VIP Offer Details will also apply to this listening option. You can change or cancel at any time by contacting us by chat or by calling 1-866-607-4225.

LOGIN_INFO.TITLE: Setup your SiriusXM streaming login(s)

LEGAL_COPY.TITLE: Important information about your subscription:
LEGAL_COPY.BODY: Your subscription starts immediately unless indicated otherwise. If your radio is not receiving the programming you are entitled to, please follow the activation instructions above. For your convenience, all subscriptions automatically renew until canceled. Your renewal will be billed at the then-current rate using the payment method on file. You can cancel your subscription at any time by calling Listener Care at 1-866-635-2349. Your subscription is governed by the SiriusXM Customer Agreement, which can be viewed online. If you would like to receive a copy of the Customer Agreement by mail, you can call 1-866-635-2349.
